00018 void Message::PrintOption(ostream& os)
00019 {

00021                 os<<"- Go to previous post [p]"<<endl;
00022         if (nextPost != 0)
00023                 os<<"- Go to next post [n]"<<endl;

00026 
00027 Post* Message::ExecuteOption(string& option, Post* p)
00028 {
00029         if (option == "p" && prevPost != 0) return prevPost;
00030         else if (option == "n" && nextPost != 0) return nextPost;
00031         else if (option == "q") return 0;
00032         else return p;
00033 }
